segments.text: I notice the woman is completely focused on drying that plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: She doesn’t even see the water pouring onto the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is stretching so far, and the stool is about to tip over.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is just standing there, waiting for her cookie.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think the woman is going to be really surprised when she finally turns around.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water is just flowing and flowing, and she doesn’t even care.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The dishes are stacked neatly, but the rest of the kitchen is a mess.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder why she hasn’t turned off the faucet yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The boy is going to get hurt if he doesn’t stop climbing like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so calm, unlike this kitchen.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can’t believe she hasn’t noticed the children sneaking cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR
